fiftyone.mobile.servlet

Class Example

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseServlet
      • fiftyone.mobile.servlet.Example

  • @WebServlet(name="Example",
            urlPatterns="/Example")
public class Example
extends BaseServlet
    A simple Servlet example, using 51Degrees to detect incoming devices.

      • calculateImages

        private String calculateImages(String propertyName,
                               String[] values)
        If there are images of the device displays them in in order with captions. It's neat feature of 51Degrees.mobi Premium.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of the property containing images.
        values - list of image values.
        Returns:
        HTML string for display.
